title: Human & Humanoid Battle Vocal Efforts Sound Pack Bundle
description: Get more for less with our Human & Humanoid Battle Vocal Efforts Sound Pack Bundle. Perfect for bringing life to your battlefield.
longDescription:
• Fantasy Character Voices - Humanoid Vocal Efforts Sound Pack

This humanoid voice pack features a wide range of vocal efforts for smaller and larger characters. Vocal efforts are an irreplaceable addition for adding game realism and are always in high demand, which is why this pack was created. It is suitable not just for fantasy creatures like orcs, goblins, trolls, giants, etc., but also adaptable for sci-fi characters and playable or non-playable characters of any genre. Be creative and have fun!

Listen on SoundCloud

Files Included List



  • Character Voices - Human Male Battle Vocal Efforts Sound Pack

This human male voice pack features a wide range of vocal efforts. Vocal efforts are an irreplaceable addition for adding game realism and are always in high demand, which is why this pack was created. It is suitable not just for medieval fantasy heroes like warriors, paladins, etc., but also adaptable for sci-fi characters and playable or non-playable characters of any genre. Be creative and have fun!

Listen on SoundCloud

Files Included List
